alert.note: Alert for Spencer; Vanderburgh; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 11:34PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Warrick, east central Vanderburgh, Spencer, Daviess, eastern Henderson, McLean, central Hopkins and eastern Webster Counties through 1115 PM CST... At 1034 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Evansville to near Providence. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Evansville and Henderson around 1040 PM CST. Newburgh around 1045 PM CST. Chandler around 1050 PM CST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Boonville, Beech Grove, Calhoun, Folsomville, Dale, Livermore and Santa Claus. This includes the following highways... Interstate 165 between Mile Markers 63 and 70. Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 118 and 148. Interstate 69 in Indiana between Mile Markers 1 and 9. Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 53 and 60. Audubon Parkway between Mile Markers 1 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
